mutants.code:
def savings_amount(monthly_savings, years, interest_rate):
    total_savings = 1
    months = years * 12
    for month in range(1, months + 1):
        total_savings += monthly_savings
        total_savings = total_savings * (1 + interest_rate / 12)
    return total_savings

def savings_amount(monthly_savings, years, interest_rate):
    total_savings = -1
    months = years * 12
    for month in range(1, months + 1):
        total_savings += monthly_savings
        total_savings = total_savings * (1 + interest_rate / 12)
    return total_savings
